sentences.english: Light Box must be placed in a dark room or curtained area with out incidental light.
sentences.chinese: 燈箱要放置在暗室或用窗簾罩住不易透光的地方。

sentences.english: She turned around again towards the light coming from the window.
sentences.chinese: 她又翻了個身，面向透光的窗戶。

sentences.english: The bathroom can use ground glass or PS board, pervious to light do not show content more appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 浴室可以用磨砂玻璃或PS板，透光不透物比較適宜。

sentences.english: This kind of xuan paper with hidden veins adopted the processing method of "translucidus notepaper ".
sentences.chinese: 這種帶暗花的宣紙使用了“透光箋”的製作方法。

sentences.english: During the war we had to black out all our windows.
sentences.chinese: 戰時我們必須用黑布遮着窗口以免透光。

sentences.english: Good dishes should be better light transmission and no impurities.
sentences.chinese: 好的器皿應該透光性較佳且無雜質。

sentences.english: Because of the thin radiolucent stripe surrounding the diverticulum, the appearance on an upper gastrointestinal series has also been described as the halo sign (3).
sentences.chinese: 因爲憩室周圍具有透光帶，此表現也被描述爲暈徵。

sentences.english: This is a masterpiece of Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-24AD) bronze craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: “透光鏡”是西漢青銅工藝的精品。

sentences.english: Study was made on transparency and colorimetry of filter membrane with phenyl silicone rubber as main material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以苯基硅橡膠爲基膠的濾光膜的透光率及色度。

sentences.english: Through the leaves of every trial there are chinks of light to shine through.
sentences.chinese: 試煉雖然圍困我們，仍有許多隙縫可以透光進來的。

sentences.english: The light guide device comprises an optical plate and a diffuser.
sentences.chinese: 該導光裝置包括光學板和透光罩。

sentences.english: Various foods, some of which are suspected of inducing an allergic reaction, are each placed in individual opaque capsules.
sentences.chinese: 各種懷疑過敏的食物分別放入特製的不透光的膠囊內。

sentences.english: The photo-permeable paraffin-coated paper bag with double layers showed the best effects on improving visual quality of Cuiguan pear cultivar fruit.
sentences.chinese: 在外觀品質改善上以雙層透光蠟紙袋效果最好。

sentences.english: Made of good-quality glass tube with high light transmission and special powder.
sentences.chinese: 採用優質的高透光玻管和特殊的熒光粉。

sentences.english: You can cover your eyes with an opaque eye mask.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用不透光的眼罩把眼睛矇住。

sentences.english: Low viscosity, fast curing, low odor, high refractive index and euphotic index.
sentences.chinese: 低粘度，固化快，低氣味，高折射率和透光率。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
